item.title: Sunday Data/Statistics Link Roundup (9/23/12)
item.description: Harvard Business school is getting in on the fun, calling the data scientist the sexy profession for the 21st century. Although I am a little worried that by the time it gets into a Harvard Business document, the hype may be outstripping the real promise of the discipline. Still, good news for statisticians! (via Rafa via Francesca D.’s Facebook feed).Â The counterpoint is this article which suggests that data scientists might be able to be replaced by tools/software.
